Posts.Content: On Aug 30, 2006 12:00 AM Elinka wrote: I have been on this med for 7 months-I too have much joint pain-pain during the night also that wakes me up! I am wondering if it is worth all this pain-there is no guarantee that in 5 years the breast cancer will not return!!! Hello there...ive just joined and looked on this site..because I too am wondering whether to carry on with the Arimidex as the aches and pains and stiffness seem to be getting worse the more months that I take it...I`ve been on them 8 months now and I`m just trying to weigh up my odds with the lack of quality of life with the risk of cancer coming back...i`ve noticed you wrote your message in 2006 did you carry on with the Arimidex ??...and how are you now???
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years
